src:
For three ultra-marathoners, NYC is the icing on the cake

03 Nov 2019, 18:39




NEW YORK CITY -- For most of us, 26.2 miles is a lot. But what about running 150 miles?
Three brothers started running 3 days ago and are topping it off with the TCS NYC Marathon.
Kemberly Richardson has more.
